scripts.start:frontend: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('apps/frontend') || fs.existsSync('apps/web') || fs.existsSync('frontend')) { const cp=require('child_process').spawn('pnpm',['nx','serve','frontend'],{stdio:'inherit', shell:true}); cp.on('exit', c=>process.exit(c)); } else { console.log('No frontend project found; skipping frontend serve'); process.stdin.resume(); }"
scripts.start:frontend:win: cmd /c start "frontend" cmd /k "pnpm nx serve frontend"
scripts.start:api: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('apps/api') || fs.existsSync('apps/server') || fs.existsSync('api')) { const cp=require('child_process').spawn('pnpm',['nx','serve','api'],{stdio:'inherit', shell:true}); cp.on('exit', c=>process.exit(c)); } else { console.log('No api project found; skipping api serve'); process.stdin.resume(); }"
scripts.start:api:win: cmd /c start "api" cmd /k "pnpm nx serve api"
scripts.start:heavy: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('services/heavy') || fs.existsSync('apps/heavy')) { const cp=require('child_process').spawn('pnpm',['nx','serve','heavy'],{stdio:'inherit', shell:true}); cp.on('exit', c=>process.exit(c)); } else { console.log('No heavy service found; skipping heavy serve'); process.stdin.resume(); }"
scripts.start:heavy:win: cmd /c start "heavy" cmd /k "pnpm nx serve heavy"
scripts.start:deps: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('docker-compose.yml')) { const cp=require('child_process').spawn('docker',['compose','up','--build'],{stdio:'inherit', shell:true}); cp.on('exit', c=>process.exit(c)); } else { console.log('No docker-compose.yml found; skipping deps'); process.stdin.resume(); }"
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n deps,frontend,api,heavy,build "pnpm run start:deps" "pnpm run start:frontend" "pnpm run start:api" "pnpm run start:heavy" "pnpm run build:watch"
scripts.build:watch: pnpm nx build frontend --watch || echo "No frontend project found; skipping build:watch"
